name: Save the Dog!
description:
Save The Dog! Intro

The year is 2030.

A Coronavirus variant has turned most of the human race into monsters. You are one of the only survivors.

You encounter a dog. It is injured, and seems to be hungry and thristy. Can you keep the dog alive?

Controls

W A S D = Player Movement

Mouse = Turn Player

Left Mouse Click = Open Door

Objective

Find all three resources to keep the dog alive!
